Title: LET NIALL SING!!!: Sign this petition to let Niall sing
Overview: All of you directioners love the boy band ONE DIRECTION! Some of you may have heard that management wants Niall to just play the guitar and not sing if you disagree with this sign this petition and get the word around post this on facebook twitter ask.fm ANYWHERE!
Letter Body: Thank you so much for dedication a few seconds to sign this petition  feel free to reshare this link to any Social Media you have an account with:

Petition ID: We will make a difference in the world because us directioners are the best fandom yet!
